column4: i killed sendmail. It takes 30 seconds to send one mail but it never sends
i dont know. maby its something with my networking.
doubt it though every thing else works
* ALERT: exim paniclog /var/log/exim4/paniclog has non-zero size, mail system possibly broken
where is the log that exim makes when it processes a request?
2008-12-16 21:25:50 socket bind() to port 25 for address 127.0.0.1 failed: Address already in use: waiting 30s before trying again (2 more tries)
This is a frequent item in the list looks like a problem. What is wrong?
what command can i use to see wahts using port 25
omg. can anyone see what im typing
there's several log files in there.... mail.warn, mail.log, mail.info, and... the big one... mail.err

i can't be much help with that really. but i thought i'd at least let you know we can see you typing in here! :-) perhaps there is a #exim or #exim4 channel if you don't get help in here? i don't know tho
take a look at your /etc/hosts file... you might need to set it up so that your system is an FQDN in it
